config.description.survivadebugstick: Makes the debug stick usable in survival
config.description.noendermangrief: Prevents enderman from picking up anything except pumpkins and melons
config.description.notooexpensive: Prevents enchantments in an anvil from getting "Too Expensive"
config.description.cheaprename: Makes renames always cost 1 level in the anvil
config.description.noxppenalty: Removes the level cap of 7 XP levels when you die
